welcome_message_body: Welcome to beautiful Yalova, Turkey! Known for its natural hot springs and stunning seaside views, we invite you to explore our charming city and enjoy all it has to offer.

restaurants.name: Sole Route
restaurants.description: Sole Route is a café located in Merkez.

restaurants.description: yalova sultan fırın is a bakery located in Yalova.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sabiha Gokcen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Sabiha Gokcen Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cengiz Topel Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
